about_the_game:
Jump, Predict, Outsmart!

All moves happen at once in this fast-paced, free-to-play turn-based game!
It’s like Rock, Paper, Scissors… on steroids!

In J-Jump Arena, you’ll plan your moves each turn, but here’s the twist - everyone’s actions happen at the same time! Carefully predict your opponents’ actions and outmaneuver them to stay in the game. Make your move… then watch as everything descends into madness - all at once.

Various Game Modes to Keep You on Your Toes

Get ready for a wild ride with a range of game modes! Fight to be the last one standing in chaotic Last Man Standing, or dominate the battlefield with the most kills in Deathmatch. Prove who's boss in intense 1 vs 1 Duels, and keep on your toes in Disappearing Platforms, where the floor vanishes under your feet. Race to victory while blasting foes in Weapon Race. And if you're all about showing off your jumping skills, Treasure Hunt's got you covered—out-jump your rivals and snatch up the most gems!

Unleash Mayhem with a Wild Arsenal

Wreak havoc with over 20 weapons, each more chaotic than the last! Get inventive with the Quacknator 9001, a rubber duck that either explodes or hilariously swells up after each turn. Or freeze your enemies in their tracks with the icy Frostcore. Prefer to go old-school? The Revolver, Grenade, and Bazooka are all locked and loaded, ready to bring the destruction. Whether you're tactical or trigger-happy, there's a weapon for every style of chaos!

Explore Diverse Environments

From treacherous Swamps to the fiery pits of Hell, each map brings its own dangers and chaos. Want to challenge gravity? Take your fight to the low-gravity madness on the Moon! With even more unique locations, every arena forces you to adapt or get left behind.

Rich Customization

Unlock a range of fun items to personalize your character and show off your unique style in the arena! Make sure your character stands out as you dominate the competition!

Features:

  • Simple, easy-to-learn mechanics.

  • Multiplayer mayhem with up to 10 players.

  • Solo mode with bots for practice or casual play.

  • Multiple game modes to keep things fresh.

  • Unlock items and customize your character.

  • Earn Steam Achievements to show off your skills.

content_descriptors.notes: Nudity without genitals and cartoon violence.

name: J-Jump Arena

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 740
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.0GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 770
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: J-Jump Arena is a free-to-play, turn-based elimination party game, challenging you to master jumps and weapon skills. Play solo or in multiplayer with up to 10 players, where moves happen simultaneously! Outsmart opponents in this fast-paced game that’s easy to learn but hard to master.
supported_languages: English, Polish, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal
